com.asm.gongbj.gradle

Class ProjectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asm.gongbj.gradle.ProjectManager

  • public class ProjectManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ProjectManager : -> You can do these things with this class : -> 1. Can create android project and library project -> 2. Can get GardleInfo of gradle project in android project. -> 3. Can get list of gradle projects in android project. it reads top-level settings.gradle

        Parameters:
        appName - : Android Project's app name
        packageName - : Android Project's pakageName
        Path - : folder path that Android Project will be generated in.

      • createLibraryProject

        public void createLibraryProject(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String packageName,
                                 java.lang.String androidProjectPath)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        It creates Library Project. When you call this method, top-level settins.gradle file will be outomatically modified.
        Parameters:
        name - : Library Project's name
        packageName - : Library Project's pakageName
        androidProjectPath - : folder path of android project that you want to create in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
